decks.notes: This Mardu Aggro deck focuses on aggressive creature plays with cards like Ocelot Pride and Amped Raptor, backed up by removal and disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Static Prison. The deck also includes powerful companions like Jegantha, the Wellspring to provide additional benefits. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with early creature pressure and efficient removal, utilizing the deck's versatile mana base and synergistic card choices to maintain board control and secure victory quickly.

This deck focuses on utilizing the Underworld Breach combo to play cards from the graveyard and create a loop of powerful spells. By utilizing cards like Emry and Mishra's Bauble to fill up the graveyard, the deck aims to quickly assemble the combo pieces needed to win the game. Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student provides card advantage while Urza's Saga helps in finding key artifacts. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Spell Snare and removal spells like Unholy Heat to control the game until the combo can be assembled.

The deck focuses on utilizing cards like Ardent Plea, Shardless Agent, and Street Wraith to cycle through the deck quickly and set up for a powerful Living End combo. By filling the graveyard with creatures, the player can cast Living End to bring them all back onto the battlefield, overwhelming their opponent. Supporting cards like Endurance and Force of Negation help protect the combo and disrupt the opponent's strategies. The deck aims to quickly assemble the necessary pieces for the Living End combo and close out the game before the opponent can respond effectively.

The deck aims to assemble powerful combo pieces quickly in order to generate massive amounts of mana through rituals and spells like Pyretic Ritual and Manamorphose. This mana is then used to cast game-ending spells like Past in Flames and Ral, Monsoon Mage. The deck also includes card draw and filtering through spells like Reckless Impulse and Wish. The overall goal is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with a storm of spells while utilizing cards like Glimpse the Impossible and Wrenn's Resolve to protect the combo.

The deck focuses on generating value through sacrificing creatures to trigger various abilities and combo off. It aims to quickly fill up the graveyard with creatures like Gravecrawler and use them to generate mana and draw cards. By utilizing cards like Boggart Trawler and Marionette Apprentice, the deck can create a loop of sacrificing and reanimating creatures to drain the opponent's life total. The deck also includes cards like Chatterfang, Squirrel General and Flare of Malice to help further this game plan and close out the game.

The deck focuses on quickly generating mana through rituals and cantrips to cast powerful spells like Past in Flames and Wish. It also aims to abuse the storm mechanic by casting multiple spells in the same turn, utilizing cards like Ruby Medallion and Ral, Monsoon Mage for extra value. The deck includes various tools for card selection and manipulation, making it a highly consistent combo deck that can win the game in a single explosive turn. It utilizes Jegantha, the Wellspring as a companion for additional mana acceleration.

This deck focuses on a fast-paced aggressive strategy, aiming to win the game as quickly as possible by playing efficient creatures and burn spells. It also utilizes the companion mechanic by including Jegantha, the Wellspring in the sideboard. The deck includes a mix of powerful creatures like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer, alongside versatile spells like Lightning Bolt and Stubborn Denial to disrupt the opponent's plans. The mana base is optimized to ensure consistency in casting the various spells and creatures included in the deck.

The deck aims to control the game through countering opponent's spells, removal spells, and card draw. The key strategy is to disrupt the opponent's game plan while slowly gaining card advantage and eventually taking control of the game. It uses a mix of efficient removal spells and powerful counterspells to protect its win conditions. It also utilizes graveyard synergies to generate value and outvalue the opponent. The mana base is carefully crafted to ensure consistent access to both colors and maximize efficiency.

This deck focuses on assembling a fast win condition without relying on lands. It utilizes a combination of countermagic, card draw, and search effects to quickly find and play key combo pieces such as Lotus Bloom and Goblin Charbelcher. By efficiently disrupting opponents and protecting its own strategy, this deck aims to quickly assemble its combo pieces and deal significant damage to secure a victory before the opponent can mount a defense.

This deck focuses on utilizing a diverse range of creatures and spells to maintain aggressive pressure on the opponent. The inclusion of Jegantha as a companion allows for additional flexibility and consistency in the deck's strategy. By utilizing a combination of powerful creatures like Scion of Draco and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer, alongside efficient removal spells like Lightning Bolt, this aggro deck aims to overwhelm the opponent quickly and efficiently. Leyline Binding and Leyline of the Guildpact provide additional support to bolster the deck's aggression and ensure its effectiveness in combat.
